game.name: Cult Nation
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: An incremental game about sacrificing all your cult followers and collecting blood to awaken the devil.
